title: Sorting fact, disinformation after Russian attack on Ukraine
description: KYIV, Ukraine (AP) — Associated Press journalists around Ukraine and beyond are documenting military activity during Russia's invasion. With disinformation rife and social media amplifying military claims and counter-claims, determining exactly what is happen…
